subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jared Jeffries’s injured wrist has stripped the Knicks of their best perimeter defender, and has perhaps stripped away some of the murkiness about Coach Isiah Thomas’s intended rotation.
snippet: Jared Jeffries’s injured wrist has stripped the Knicks of their best perimeter defender, and has perhaps stripped away some of the murkiness about Coach Isiah Thomas’s intended rotation.
